mapper.select:
select ci.corp_id "corpId", ci.corp_name "corpName",ci.corp_type "corpType",ci.is_country "isCountry", ci.sys_type "sysType", ci.note "note", ci.legal_person "legalPerson", ci.fixed_phone "fixedPhone", ci.reg_date "regDate", ci.logo_url "logoUrl", ci.office_address "officeAddress", ci.spec_natural "specNatural", ci.business_license "businessLicense", NVL(a.num,0) "supplierNum", ci.email "email" from corp_info ci LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(1) num, corp_id FROM corp_info group by corp_id) a ON ci.corp_id = a.corp_id
ci.status=1
and ci.corp_id = '${corpId}'
and ci.corp_id in ${userCorpList}
and ci.corp_name = '${corpName}'
and ci.corp_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', '${corpName}'),'%')
and ci.legal_person LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', ${legalPerson}),'%')
and ci.sys_type=${sysType}
select c.corp_id corpId from corp_info c where c.status=1

select ci.corp_name "corpName",ci.sys_type "sysType",ci.core_corp_id, ci.orgn_num "orgnNum"
from corp_info ci
ci.status=1
and ci.core_corp_id = #{corpId}
and ci.sys_type = 5

SELECT corp_id "corpId", corp_name "customerName", customer_app_serial_num "customerAppSerialNum", app_num "appNum", orgn_num "orgnNum", applicant_name "applicantName", applicant_fix_phone "applicantFixPhone", applicant_phone "applicantPhone", apply_amt "applyAmt" FROM corp_info WHERE sys_type = #{sysType} AND is_push = #{isPush} AND customer_app_serial_num IS NULL AND core_corp_id = (SELECT corp_id FROM corp_info WHERE orgn_num = #{orgnNum}) ORDER BY create_time LIMIT 0, #{size}
select DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, CORP_ID, PARENT_ID, DEPT_TYPE, STAFF_NUM, FUNCTIONS, ORG_STRUCTURE_PATH, CONTACT_PERSON, CONTACT_PHONE, NOTE, CREATE_TIME, STATUS from CORP_DEPT
